name: Andrew Boissonnault
body:
Software developer with experience building mobile applications for both iOS and Android and the REST APIs to support them using Google App Engine and Grails.

I also put a lot of focus on automated testing and readability so that I can integrate well with existing or future team members.

####Find me on

[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/andrew-boissonnault/2b/4a3/68a)

[Github](https://github.com/andrewboissonnault)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Andrew_Boissonn)

[Stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/1120281/andrew-boissonnault)

####Contact me at

aboiss@gmail.com

413-206-6999
